title: The True Paradigm: Interface vs Intelligence

constraints.name: agents_are_ux_layer
constraints.notes: Agents live outside both tracts as UX layer

constraints.name: tracts_are_operator_pipelines
constraints.notes: Tracts are pipelines of small, typed operators | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ tract ∈ {T_ext, T_int} : typeof(tract) = Pipeline[TypedOperators]

constraints.name: new_data_flow
constraints.notes: Reframed data flow through three components | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): Agents → T_ext ↔ C_c ↔ T_int

constraints.name: t_ext_transforms_nl_to_goalspec
constraints.notes: T_ext converts natural language to structured goals

constraints.name: c_c_is_bridge_operators
constraints.notes: Corpus Callosum = thin bridge of operators

constraints.name: c_c_uses_dgr
constraints.notes: C_c uses DGR for encoding/decoding between tracts

constraints.name: agent_layer_is_nondeterministic
constraints.notes: Agent layer is conversational and non-deterministic | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ¬deterministic(Agents)

constraints.name: operator_engine_is_deterministic
constraints.notes: Operator engine (all tracts) is deterministic | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): deterministic(T_ext) ∧ deterministic(T_int) ∧ deterministic(C_c)

constraints.name: operator_engine_is_measurable
constraints.notes: Operator engine performance is measurable | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): measurable(T_ext) ∧ measurable(T_int) ∧ measurable(C_c)

constraints.name: clean_separation
constraints.notes: Clean separation between conversational and deterministic layers

constraints.name: operators_use_structured_data
constraints.notes: Operators work with structured data, not natural language | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ op ∈ Operators : works_with(op, StructuredData)

constraints.name: operators_have_budgets
constraints.notes: Operators have resource budgets | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ op ∈ Operators : has(op, budget)

constraints.name: operators_emit_metrics
constraints.notes: Operators emit metrics (Ψ, R_i) | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ op ∈ Operators : emits(op, {Ψ, R_i})

constraints.name: operators_testable_in_isolation
constraints.notes: Each operator can be tested independently | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ op ∈ Operators : testable(op, isolation=True)

constraints.name: operators_predictable
constraints.notes: Operator behavior is predictable | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ op ∈ Operators : predictable(behavior(op))
